abstract: A combination of Comcast and Time Warner Cable would yield big benefits for both companies and face fewer challenges than many people think, a Citigroup analyst said.
snippet: A combination of Comcast and Time Warner Cable would yield big benefits for both companies and face fewer challenges than many people think, a Citigroup analyst said.
lead_paragraph: Until recently, it seemed like a nonstarter. But one analyst says that the cable industry could be — or should be — gearing up for a megamerger.
